item.title: By: Jeryl Levin
item.dc:creator: Jeryl Levin
item.description: Lewis: Great blog and pics! Much better than my pictures. It was a pleasure touring Israel and Jordan with you, and I hope we stay in touch. I'm eventually going to get to the Facebook page for us! Jeryl (the other Levin)
item.content:encoded:
Lewis: Great blog and pics! Much better than my pictures. It was a pleasure touring Israel and Jordan with you, and I hope we stay in touch.
I’m eventually going to get to the Facebook page for us!
Jeryl (the other Levin)

item.title: By: Philippe
item.dc:creator: Philippe
item.description: It is about time you go to Israel. Sounds like a great agenda.
item.content:encoded: It is about time you go to Israel. Sounds like a great agenda.

item.title: By: David Monson
item.dc:creator: David Monson
item.description: I'll be watching every day. I really feel you gave me a good basis when we saw each other of what you will encounter. I will be interested to see if your study before traveling corresponds with what you actually find on the ground. David
item.content:encoded:
I’ll be watching every day. I really feel you gave me a good basis when we saw each other of what you will encounter. I will be interested to see if your study before traveling corresponds with what you actually find on the ground.
David
